page.title: 11WORKING FATHERS-TEANASSIE
page.content: Many fathers work locally-35% do.They work in forestry,or for the North of Scotland Hydro-electric Board or in local industry.But the main percentage work in Inverness. One boy's father works 111 miles away in Wick.It is obvious from the graph on page 8 that oil-related jobs have made a difference to employment in this area.Nigg,Ardersier and Wick are the areas involved in the oil indus- try.Many fathers work far away because that is where the employment is. They drive to work and and some are away from home during the week and come home at weekends.All families have at least one car as public transport is limited in this area
